source: TEXT_GAIUSB612_00894_SEQ_00<tab>Stephannot has no love for adventurers, but beggars cannot be choosers and your help is urgently needed.
target: TEXT_GAIUSB612_00894_SEQ_00<tab>Stephannot se fait du souci pour une jeune recrue.

source: TEXT_GAIUSB612_00894_SEQ_01<tab>One of Stephannot's young recruits has gone missing after leaving for Camp Dragonhead. He is likely lost on the north road where wild creatures sometimes stalk soft prey. Follow the recruit's trail while it is still fresh.
target: TEXT_GAIUSB612_00894_SEQ_01<tab>Stephannot s'inquiète pour une jeune recrue partie chercher du ra<var 16 /var>vi<var 16 /var>tail<var 16 /var>le<var 16 /var>ment au camp de la Tête du dragon. Suivez la route qui part vers le nord et essayez de retrouver sa trace.

source: TEXT_GAIUSB612_00894_SEQ_02<tab>After a brutal battle in which you nearly lost <var 08 E905 ((the source of your roguish charm)) ((your most precious appendage)) /var>, the croc is dispatched. Like any good sleuth, you search the body and find a scarred silver ring, the least unspeakable of the creature's visceral cargo. See it to Stephannot's hands.
target: TEXT_GAIUSB612_00894_SEQ_02<tab>Dans le ventre d'<var 33 ((BNpcName)) 02F203100202 /var>, vous avez trouvé <var 33 ((EventItem)) 02F61E873D0202 /var>. Retournez aux Cadenas pour l'apporter à Stephannot.

source: TEXT_GAIUSB612_00894_SEQ_03<tab>Stephannot confirms that the ring belonged to the young recruit. You are surprised to initially find him so resistant to the obvious truth, for he struck you as a pragmatic man. It seems that in Ishgard, being devoured by beastkin shames the eaten...
target: TEXT_GAIUSB612_00894_SEQ_03<tab>Vous avez remis l'anneau à Stephannot, visiblement très touché par la disparition d'un jeune garçon plein d'avenir et bien décidé à combattre les dragons au nom d'Ishgard.
TEXT_GAIUSB612_00894_TODO_00<tab>Retrouver la trace de la nouvelle recrue

source: TEXT_GAIUSB612_00894_STEPHANNOT_000_000<tab>He should be back by now, even if he had to wait out the worst of this storm. Could he have wandered onto the north road? That way roam feral crocs...
target: TEXT_GAIUSB612_00894_STEPHANNOT_000_000<tab>Qu'est-ce qui peut bien lui prendre aussi longtemps<var 1D /var>? J'espère qu'il n'a pas perdu son chemin dans la tempête de neige. La route du nord est infestée de <var 33 ((BNpcName)) 0DF203100302 /var>, tous plus féroces les uns que les autres.

source: TEXT_GAIUSB612_00894_STEPHANNOT_000_001<tab>Ahem...adventurer. I sent a runner to Camp Dragonhead, but he is many hours overdue. I fear he has lost his way, green recruit that he is. I would prevail upon you to fetch him back.
target: TEXT_GAIUSB612_00894_STEPHANNOT_000_001<tab>J'ai envoyé une jeune recrue chercher du ra<var 16 /var>vi<var 16 /var>tail<var 16 /var>le<var 16 /var>ment au camp de la Tête du dragon, et il ne revient pas... Pourriez-vous essayer de le retrouver pour moi<var 1D /var>?

TEXT_GAIUSB612_00894_DUMMY_000_010北の街道沿いに落ちているeobjをたどる(3つほど)
最後のeobj(刺さってる剣)を調べると「」がポップ
倒すと「」をゲット

source: TEXT_GAIUSB612_00894_STEPHANNOT_000_020<tab>Ah, adventurer. Where is the tomfool? If he's lost something to frostbite, he has none to blame but himself.
target: TEXT_GAIUSB612_00894_STEPHANNOT_000_020<tab>Oh, c'est vous. Alors, vous avez retrouvé la trace de cette jeune recrue<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_GAIUSB612_00894_STEPHANNOT_000_030<tab>This is the boy's ring. What is the meaning of this? A feral croc... Are you certain? He could simply have dropped it! I'll not stand for surmise when the boy's honor...what? Yes. He had ginger hair. Oh, for the ruth of Halone...
target: TEXT_GAIUSB612_00894_STEPHANNOT_000_030<tab>Le pauvre garçon, il était encore tellement jeune et promis à un bel avenir. Perdre la vie de cette façon, quel gâchis... Lui qui était si impatient à l'idée de combattre les dragons, il a dû ressentir un profond sentiment de frustration en rendant son dernier souffle.

source: TEXT_GAIUSB612_00894_STEPHANNOT_000_031<tab>He was a good lad, afire to take his place in the war against the dragons. To die so ignominiously instead...I cannot tell his sire, yet to lie to a fellow knight about his own son─'tis more than I can tease out right now.
target: TEXT_GAIUSB612_00894_STEPHANNOT_000_031<tab>Je vous remercie d'être venu<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var> m'annoncer cette triste nouvelle. Et le plus dur reste à faire, il va falloir prévenir sa famille maintenant...

source: TEXT_GAIUSB612_00894_POP_MESSAGE_000<tab>You sense a creature swift and massive!
